help-file.title: "AREA MAKING" AREAS BUILDING
help-file.content: The world of Duris is made up of various "zones" or areas, created by a number of different people. Each zone is normally set around a theme, and the levels intended for zones can vary greatly. Any player on Duris can create a zone and submit it for approval. DikuEdit makes this much more simple for the average player. To see a current list of zones, their levels, and builders, type "credit".
